roleset.name: extreme, rich, concentrated

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is intense (if in addition)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to 'intensify'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: On the other hand , the standard of living of other countries ' peoples is rising , their education levels will rise , and anti-American passion also will not will not be so intense .

example.name: both args
example.text: The saffron lobster bisque broth was intense in flavor but let each aspect of the dish shine through!
